name: @conwell/sql-soar
description: A SQL build and query tool for node.js.

scripts.test: npm run test:mysql && npm run test:postgresql && npm run test:shared
scripts.test:all: npm run test:mysql && npm run test:postgresql && npm run test:shared
scripts.start:postgres: podman run -d --name postgres-test -e POSTGRES_DB=soar -e POSTGRES_USER=soaruser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=1234soar -p 5432:5432 -v postgres-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:16
scripts.stop:postgres: podman stop postgres-test && podman rm postgres-test
scripts.setup:postgres: podman exec -i postgres-test psql -U soaruser -d soar < test/sampleData/postgresql/schema.sql && podman exec -i postgres-test psql -U soaruser -d soar < test/sampleData/postgresql/sampleData.sql
scripts.start:mysql: podman run -d --name mysql-test -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=soar -e MYSQL_USER=testuser -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=testpass -p 3306:3306 -v mysql-data:/var/lib/mysql mysql:8.0
scripts.stop:mysql: podman stop mysql-test && podman rm mysql-test
scripts.setup:mysql: podman exec -i mysql-test mysql -u testuser -ptestpass soar < test/sampleData/mysql/schema.sql && podman exec -i mysql-test mysql -u testuser -ptestpass soar < test/sampleData/mysql/sampleData.sql
scripts.setup:mysql:memory: podman exec -i mysql-test mysql -u testuser -ptestpass soar < test/sampleData/mysql/schema_memory.sql && podman exec -i mysql-test mysql -u testuser -ptestpass soar < test/sampleData/mysql/sampleData.sql
